description:
Two students have been killed one after the next and all of the evidence seems to point at Hagakure. But the way Naegi sees it, things just aren`t adding up quite right. Is their blood really on Hagakure`s hands or has he been framed?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Not Normal Arc: Return of the New Century Galaxy Legend! O Armored Hero, Stand upon the Earth!
Shinseiki Ginga Densetsu Futatabi! Soukou Yuusha yo Daichi ni Tate! Hinichijou Hen
新世紀銀河伝説再び! 装甲勇者よ大地に立て! 非日常編
